analysis.description:
ETHLottery.play (/unique_chucks/13/0xc5559887f94ea5c406b3f6d582dc738c4cf0eace.sol#106-127) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- ! owner.send(owner_fee_amount) (/unique_chucks/13/0xc5559887f94ea5c406b3f6d582dc738c4cf0eace.sol#117-118)

ETHLottery.accumulate (/unique_chucks/13/0xc5559887f94ea5c406b3f6d582dc738c4cf0eace.sol#175-183) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- msg.sender.send(this.balance) (/unique_chucks/13/0xc5559887f94ea5c406b3f6d582dc738c4cf0eace.sol#181-183)

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/13/0xc5559887f94ea5c406b3f6d582dc738c4cf0eace.sol#147:
	- Usage of "block.blockhash()" should be replaced with "blockhash()"

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/13/0xc5559887f94ea5c406b3f6d582dc738c4cf0eace.sol#99-106:
	- Usage of "block.blockhash()" should be replaced with "blockhash()"

elements.expression: require(bool)(block.number >= result_block && block.number <= result_block + 256 && block.blockhash(result_block) != result_hash)
